summary:
This mod will overhaul your entire landscape with high quality parallax textures. This mod uses textures from several popular mods here on the Nexus. Every single texture has been carefully compared, selected and in some cases adjusted to blend in better.
All textures are optimized and available in 1K, 2K and 4K resolutions to suit your setup
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][img]https://s20.postimg.cc/swuriv365/Title_2_85.png[/img]


[youtube]OX5gDPWpXMY[/youtube]   [youtube]H3BUTcIj-W4[/youtube]


[size=5][color=#f9cb9c]Description[/color]
[/size]
[color=#dbb0a7][size=3]This mod will overhaul your entire landscape with high quality ground textures with parallax effect. All textures have been optimized and are available in resolutions ranging from 1K to 4K to suit your own setup.
[/size]
[size=3]This texture overhaul uses textures from several popular mods here on the Nexus:[/size]
[/color][color=#dbb0a7]
[/color][size=2][color=#dd7e6b][i]Skyrim HD - Terrain Parallax Tribute[/i] [/color][color=#85200c]by Hein84[/color]
[i][color=#dd7e6b]Skyrim 2016 Terrain Parallax STP [/color][/i][color=#85200c]by Pfuscher[/color]
[i][color=#dd7e6b]tamu75 Terrain Parallax Textures [/color][/i][color=#85200c]by tamu75[/color]
[i][color=#dd7e6b]Vivid Landscapes - Woods [/color][/i][color=#85200c]by Hein84[/color]
[i][color=#dd7e6b]Quality Snow HD 4K [/color][/i][/size][color=#85200c][size=2]by Yuril[/size][/color]

[color=#dbb0a7][size=3]Every single texture has been carefully compared, selected and in some cases adjusted to make this texture pack as complete and lore-friendly as possible.[/size][/color]
[size=3][color=#dbb0a7]The adjustments made involve brightness tweaks for CoastBeach, DirtPath and Snow textures and also color tweaks for the CoastBeach textures, mainly to make these textures look better with ENB's, including my own[/color] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73661][color=#dd7e6b]Revenant ENB[/color][/url]﻿[color=#dbb0a7].[/color][/size]

[color=#dbb0a7][size=3]Additionally, this mod includes Hein84's Mesh Fix from Skyrim HD - Terrain Parallax Tribute to fix some of the bad terrain texture (actually mesh) transitions or seams in your game.[/size][/color]


[color=#f9cb9c][size=5]Special Notes[/size][/color][color=#f9cb9c][size=5]
[/size][/color]
[size=3][color=#dbb0a7]The plugin (.esp file) provided in this mod is not explicitly required for the textures to work. [/color][/size][color=#dbb0a7][size=3]It is only needed to apply a little bit of extra depth from the parallax maps to the snow textures and the Reach and FallForest roads, but you'll barely notice the difference most of the time. The normal maps already have great 3D depth.[/size][/color]

[size=3][color=#dbb0a7]If you are an ENB user, don't forget to set [/color][color=#85200c]FixParallaxBugs=true[/color][color=#dbb0a7] and [/color][color=#85200c]FixParallaxTerrain=true[/color][color=#dbb0a7] under [/color][color=#85200c][FIX][/color][color=#f9cb9c] [/color][color=#dbb0a7]in [/color][color=#85200c]enblocal.ini[/color][color=#dbb0a7] if you haven't already to take advantage of the Parallax effect! Otherwise, the textures will tear and look messed up.[/color][/size]

[color=#dbb0a7][size=3]Although these textures are referred to as "parallax" - ENB is required to actually show that effect, you can also choose not to use an ENB together with these textures. Everything will work and look fine, except for that you will not get the nice looking 3D effect; the textures will just look plain and flat like normal.[/size][/color]

[size=3][color=#dbb0a7]Installation of Skyrim HD by [/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3101794][color=#dd7e6b]NebuLa1[/color][/url]﻿[color=#dbb0a7] beforehand and/or the Vivid Landscapes series by [/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3212020][color=#dd7e6b]Hein84[/color][/url]﻿[color=#dbb0a7] afterwards is very much recommended as many of the textures in my mod are based on these mods![/color]
[/size]

[color=#f9cb9c][size=5]Permissions & Credits[/size][/color]

[color=#dbb0a7][size=3]I would like to clarify that I have full permissions from the mod authors from whom I have used files to adjust and use their files in this mod, as was discussed in personal messages or described in their PERMS.[/size][/color]

[color=#dbb0a7][size=3]Finally, I would like to thank
[/size][/color][color=#dbb0a7][size=3]Hein84
Pfuscher
tamu75
& Yuril
once more for allowing me to use their fantastic files![/size][/color]
[/font][/center]
author: Exalerion
